pages.text: The $(item)Fragile Activation Crystal$() is a one-time use ritual activator. While less powerful than a standard activation crystal, it provides a cheaper alternative for occasional ritual use.$(br2)Like a weak activation crystal, it must be bound to a player before it can activate rituals.
Created in a $(thing)Tier 2$() Blood Altar by imbuing a $(item)Clay Ball$() with 5000 LP.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Binding:$()$(br)Right-click while holding the crystal to bind it to yourself.$(br2)$(bold)Activation:$()$(br)Right-click on a Master Ritual Stone with the bound crystal to activate the ritual.$(br2)$(bold)Warning:$()$(br)The crystal will $(c)shatter$() and be consumed after successfully activating a ritual!
